Starting and Ending Sessions

You can configure the system to do the following when users start and end sessions:

l Require users to log on when starting a session.

l Close the application after each session.

l Prompt users for confirmation when exiting the application.

l Allow users to discontinue orders from the previous session when transferring a patient out of or into a room or bed.

l Apply or waive access right requirements when users discontinue orders during patient transfers.

l Open the Demographics window when transferring or discharging a patient. (This feature would typically be used in the OR to allow users to check that all required information has been documented. See also Demographics.)
